Name: Riviera Breeze
Ingredients: 75 ml Thomas Henry Ginger Ale chilled
Instructions: POUR all ingredients into chilled glass, then fill glass with ice.
Review: A ginger and aniseed-fresh summertime cooler.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2003 by Rool Buckley at Café Lebowitz in New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Riviera Breeze contains 104 calories
